_header: If thou seekest love and wilt Him find
_description: Holiness the Road to Love and Honor — three couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
ȝef þu sekest loue & wilt him findeIn holinesse þi
                    life þu bindeȝef þu wilt han worchipe þat may neuere
                    slakeHolinesse fast hold and senne þu forsakeȝef þu
                    wilt ben dred & men toþe lutenHolinesse euere hold withinnen &
                    eek withouten
NLS18721.Note:
Each couplet connected with a red line to the caption in the Latin
                    preface which precedes the text.
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 61.
